content: alpine stitch wash cloth by carolyn calderon the alpine stitch wash cloth is ribbed and full of texture on both sides of the fabric stitches used are single_crochet double_crochet fpdc this makes a wonderful addition to your home or a beautiful gift this is part of the relax & refresh wash cloth crochet along i used bernat softee baby cotton #3 for the smaller size and sugar n cream #4 for the larger size includes written instructions in us terminology please see pattern website for details and video tutorials on how to make the stitch thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
